component.ingredient_statement:
EITHER: Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK, Sugar, Cream (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Whey Powder (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Glucose Syrup, Stabilisers (Guar Gum, Carrageenan), Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Flavouring.
OR: Allergen Ingredient: Reconstituted Skimmed MILK, Cream (Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Sugar, Allergen Ingredient: MILK Protein, Glucose Syrup, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Stabilisers (Guar Gum, Carrageenan), Emulsifier (Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids), Flavouring.

Milk Chocolate (76%) (Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Cocoa Mass, Lactose (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Vegetable Fat (Palm), Whey Powder (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Allergen Ingredient: MILK Fat, Emulsifier Allergen Ingredient: SOYA Lecithin), Natural Vanilla Extract), Honeycomb Pieces (20%) (Glucose Syrup, Allergen Ingredient: BARLEY Malt Extract, Allergen Ingredient: Skimmed MILK Powder, Vegetable Fat (Palm), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Flour, Sugar, Raising Agents (Calcium Phosphates, Sodium Carbonates, Potassium Carbonates), Allergen Ingredient: WHEAT Gluten, Whey Powder (from Allergen Ingredient: MILK), Salt), Cocoa Butter, Glazing Agent (Gum Arabic, Shellac), Sucrose, Glucose Syrup, Vegetable Oil (Coconut).
Potential Allergen Ingredient: NB: May also contain traces of oat.

item.description: Soft dairy ice cream swirled with mini Malteser clusters.

footer.footer_name36: Allergy Advice: For allergens including cereals containing gluten see ingredients in BOLD
footer.footer_name41: We produce our food in kitchens where allergens are handled by our people, and where equipment and utensils are used for multiple menu items, including those containing allergens.  Although your meal is prepared with care, we cannot guarantee it will be allergen free, even after ingredients have been removed on request. While there are no nuts or peanut ingredients in the products listed we can’t guarantee that our food is completely nut or peanut free.

item.item_allergen: Contains Milk, Soy, Wheat, Barley.|May also contain Oat.

item.item_meta_description: Maltesers Reindeer McFlurry, soft dairy ice cream swirled with mini Malteaser Reindeer® shapes, mini Maltesers® clusters and a milk chocolate sauce.
